page.title: 04BIOGRAPHY
page.content: MRS SELBY WAS THE OLDEST PERSON TO BE INTERVIEWED.SHE RESIDES AT ONE OF THE FOUR NURSING HOMES ON THE BARNHORN ROAD.SHE IS 92,THOUGH SHE HAS ONLY LIVED THERE FOR THREE YEARS.HER DAY BEGINS AT 8-30;SHE IS OFTEN VISITED BY HER DAUGHTER PEGGY WHO BRINGS MRS SELBY'S DOG NIPPER ALONG AND OFTEN GOES OUT.SHE CAN'T KEEP HIM THERE BUT HAS 2 GOLDFISH. SHE HAS LOTS OF FRIENDS WHO VISIT.SHE LIKES PAINTING, AND WAS A VIOLINIST:SHE LOVES OPERA, HER FAVOURITE TV PROGRAMME IS SONGS OF PRAISE AND SHE ENJOYS GOING TO CHURCH. SHE HATES CATS,TORTOISES,SOAP OPERAS, CHILDREN WITH PIERCED EARS OR HIGH HEELED SHOES.SHE HAS HER OWN ROOM.HER FAVOURITE FLOWER IS DANDYLIONS;SHE ENJOYS GIN AND WINE AND LIKES TO EAT PANCAKES.SHE LIKES THE TOWN AND WOULD LOVE TO GET ABOUT MORE BUT SAYS THERE SHOULD BE MORE FOR FOR YOUNG PEOPLE.
